ResearchTabDef.label: Heavy industry
ResearchTabDef.generalDescription: Heavy industry and those technologies are the basis of mass production and the key to progress of human society.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ENIAC
ResearchProjectDef.description: Electronic Numerical Integrator And Computer, also known as ENIAC is an early Turing-complete general-purpose digital computer able to solve "a large class of numerical problems" through reprogramming. Crude and power-hungry but indispensable for research purposes.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText:
[Interstellar Industries Complex Nara Terminal] [ version="1.5"] [ encoding="UTF-8" ] Loading....
[To user] Being able to build ENIAC and read this information means that you or your civilization already has the minimum requirements for the realization of the technology in the disc. We look forward to further cooperation with you to create a beautiful industrialized society in the rimworld. OS>:_

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->included a strange data disc in the schematic
subject_story->repeatedly mentioned that the invention of the vacuum tube was the cornerstone of computer technology
subject_story->wrote many messy notes in the margins of the schematic
subject_story->constantly conveys to people that computers are omnipotent gods
subject_story->attached a brand logo sticker from Nara Industries on machine
subject_story->summarized in great detail the manufacturing techniques and processes involved in producing vacuum tube computers.
